The short answer is yes, you can put this on the left side. We designed SCROLLNADO so that it works with most lifts (really all of the ones that I am aware of). Most of these lifts install towards the of the scroll saw arm. SCROLLNADO attaches on the very bottom of the arm.

t: Three weeks of the *Nadoes - Scroll Saw Woodworking and Crafts Message Board
s: The Scrollnado works much better without the blower. I just laid my blower hose back along the arm of the saw. I had to modify the holes in the bottom tube to handle 45° cuts for my bowls but just the bottom hole in the tube and not by much. Is it worth $50 on Amazon?
